name: Wooper

evolution.description: Wooper can evolve into Quagsire at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Water Fish Pokémon. Wooper usually lives in water. However, it occasionally comes out onto land in search of food. On land, it coats its body with a gooey, toxic film.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: This Pokémon is unaffected by Self Destruct and Explosion moves.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from water or water-type attacks. Instead, half of any water damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.description: When this Pokémon attacks an opponent, it ignores any stat changes the opponent has been affected with after the start of battle.
